title: The Redemption Path
synopsis: A disgraced detective confronts his past while investigating a series of murders that mirror his own unsolved case. As he closes in on the truth, he realizes redemption may demand a final sacrifice.

acts.title: Act I – The Return
acts.summary: The detective, haunted by his past, returns to the city after years away when a new case mirrors the one that ended his career.

shots.title: Opening Establishing Shot
shots.visual_description: A rain-soaked city skyline at night, neon lights reflecting off puddles as the camera glides toward a flickering sign reading 'POLICE DEPARTMENT'.

inputs.text: Rain-soaked city skyline at night, neon reflections gliding across puddles.

inputs.prompt: Rain-soaked city skyline at night, neon reflections gliding across puddles.

inputs.text: Dimly lit detective office filled with smoke and old case files, close-up mood.

shots.title: The Detective's Office
shots.visual_description: Inside a dimly lit office filled with cigarette smoke and old case files. The detective sits in silence, staring at a faded photograph.

dialogue.line: They say time heals all wounds... but some wounds rot instead.

inputs.text: Police radio dispatch crackles as detective grabs coat and exits office.

workflow.title: Call to Action
workflow.visual_description: A police radio crackles to life with a dispatch about a new murder downtown. Harris grabs his coat and leaves.

acts.title: Act II – The Descent
acts.summary: The detective investigates, uncovering that the killer is recreating his old case scene by scene.

shots.title: Crime Scene Alley
shots.visual_description: Police tape flutters in the rain. Harris kneels beside a chalk outline that looks eerily familiar.

dialogue.line: Same pattern as before. Whoever did this studied your case files.

inputs.prompt: Rain-soaked alley crime scene, detective kneeling by chalk outline with police tape fluttering.

acts.title: Act III – The Reckoning
acts.summary: Harris discovers the killer’s identity and faces his own moral breaking point in the process.

shots.title: Final Confrontation
shots.visual_description: In an abandoned warehouse, Harris confronts the killer — a reflection of his former self. The rain outside grows heavier as sirens approach.

dialogue.line: You wanted the truth, didn’t you? Then look at yourself!

inputs.prompt: Abandoned warehouse showdown between detective and killer, cinematic rain outside.

shots.title: Closing Shot
shots.visual_description: Dawn breaks over the city as Harris walks away from the crime scene, blood on his hands, but peace in his eyes.

inputs.prompt: Dawn skyline as detective walks away from crime scene, soft sunrise glow.
